cause.description:
Crohn's disease affects between 400,000 and 600,000 people in North America alone. Crohn’s disease is an ongoing disorder that causes inflammation of the digestive tract, also referred to as the gastrointestinal (GI) tract. Crohn’s disease can affect any area of the GI tract, from the mouth to the anus, but it most commonly affects the lower part of the small intestine, called the ileum. The swelling extends deep into the lining of the affected organ. The swelling can cause pain and can make the intestines empty frequently, resulting in diarrhea.
1. Help 400,000 - 600,000 people find peace and begin to live a better, more pain free life
cause.mission: Find a cure to Crohns Disease
cause.name: Cure Crohns Disease
